con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="LivreService" targetNamespace="http://www.example.org/LivreService/" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:tns="http://www.example.org/LivreService/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema targetNamespace="http://www.example.org/LivreService/" xmlns:Q1="http://www.example.org/types"> <xsd:import schemaLocation="../beans.xsd" namespace="http://www.example.org/types"/> <xsd:element name="rechercherLivre"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:element name="titre" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"></xsd:element> <xsd:element name="auteur" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"></xsd:element> <xsd:element name="genre" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"></xsd:element> <xsd:element name="langue" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"></xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="rechercherLivreResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:element name="livre" type="Q1:Livre" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"></xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="voirDispo"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="livreId" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"></xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="voirDispoResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:sequence minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"> <xsd:element name="biliotheque" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1"></xsd:element> <xsd:element name="nombre" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"></xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="listerPretEnCours"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="utilisateurId" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="listerPretEnCoursResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:element name="pret" type="Q1:Pret" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="prolongerPret"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:element name="pretId" type="xsd:int" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="prolongerPretResponse"> <xsd:complexType></xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="listerPretEnRetard"> <xsd:complexType></xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="listerPretEnRetardResponse"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"> <xsd:element name="pret" type="Q1:Pret" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="voirDispoFault"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="FaultMessage" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"></xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="listerPretEnCoursFault"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="FaultMessage" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"></xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="prolongerPretFault"> <xsd:complexType> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="FaultMessage" type="xsd:string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"></xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:element> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="rechercherLivreRequest"> <wsdl:part element="tns:rechercherLivre" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="rechercherLivreResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:rechercherLivreResponse" name="parameters"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="voirDispoRequest"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:voirDispo"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="voirDispoResponse"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:voirDispoResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="listerPretEnCoursRequest"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:listerPretEnCours"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="listerPretEnCoursResponse"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:listerPretEnCoursResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="prolongerPretRequest"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:prolongerPret"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="prolongerPretResponse"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:prolongerPretResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="listerPretEnRetardRequest"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:listerPretEnRetard"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="listerPretEnRetardResponse"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:listerPretEnRetardResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="voirDispoFault"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:voirDispoFault"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="listerPretEnCoursFault"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:listerPretEnCoursFault"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="prolongerPretFault"> <wsdl:part name="parameters" element="tns:prolongerPretFault"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="LivreService"> <wsdl:operation name="rechercherLivre"> <wsdl:input message="tns:rechercherLivreRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:rechercherLivreResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="voirDispo"> <wsdl:input message="tns:voirDispoRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:voirDispoResponse"/> <wsdl:fault name="fault" message="tns:voirDispoFault"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="listerPretEnCours"> <wsdl:input message="tns:listerPretEnCoursRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:listerPretEnCoursResponse"/> <wsdl:fault name="fault" message="tns:listerPretEnCoursFault"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="prolongerPret"> <wsdl:input message="tns:prolongerPretRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:prolongerPretResponse"/> <wsdl:fault name="fault" message="tns:prolongerPretFault"/> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="listerPretEnRetard"> <wsdl:input message="tns:listerPretEnRetardRequest"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:listerPretEnRetardResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="LivreServiceSOAP" type="tns:LivreService"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="rechercherLivre"> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="voirDispo"> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> name="listerPretEnCours"> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="fault"> <soap:fault use="literal" name="fault"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="prolongerPret"> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="fault"> <soap:fault use="literal" name="fault"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="listerPretEnRetard"> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="LivreService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:LivreServiceSOAP" name="LivreServiceSOAP"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/biblioService/services/livre"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

<schema targetNamespace="http://www.example.org/types" elementFormDefault="qualified" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.example.org/types"> <complexType name="Livre"> <sequence> <element name="isbn" type="string" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="titre" type="string" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="editeur" type="tns:Editeur" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"></element> <element name="datePublication" type="date" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="description" type="tns:Description" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"></element> <element name="langue" type="string" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="auteur" type="tns:Auteur" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"></element> <element name="genre" type="string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="Editeur"> <sequence> <element name="id" type="int" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="nom" type="string" minOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="Description"> <sequence> <element name="id" type="int" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="titre" type="string" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="paragraphes" type="string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="Auteur"> <sequence> <element name="id" type="int" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="nom" type="string" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="prenom" type="string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="Exemplaire"> <sequence> <element name="id" type="int" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="livre" type="tns:Livre" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="bibliotheque" type="string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="UtilisateurBD"> <sequence> <element name="id" type="int" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="email" type="string" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="nom" type="string" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="prenom" type="string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"></element> <element name="mdp" type="string" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"></element> <element name="sel" type="string" minOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="Utilisateur"> <sequence> <element name="id" type="int" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="email" type="string" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="nom" type="string" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="prenom" type="string" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="Pret"> <sequence> <element name="id" type="int" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="dateDebut" type="date" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="dateFin" type="date" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="renouvele" type="boolean" minOccurs="1"/> <element name="utilisateur" type="tns:Utilisateur" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="exemplaire" type="tns:Exemplaire" minOccurs="1"/> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>
